data.text: Israeli vahe'ma kinama ome hu'naza vahe'ma Ra Anumzamo'ma ete zamavarenoma Jerusalemi kumate'ma egeta, tagra ava'na negompi huta hu'none.
Ana zupa tagra tusi kizazokago nehuta, zagame huta muse hu'none. Ana'ma nehunke'za ana zupa kokankoka vahe'mo'za amanage hu'naze. Ra Anumzamo'a ruzahu'za huno Israeli vahera zamaza hie hu'za hu'naze.
Tamage, Ra Anumzamo'a ruzahu'za huno tagrira taza higeta tusi muse hu'none.
Negevi hagage kokampima tima enevuno mikazama eri kasefa'ma nehiaza hunka, knare'zanu Ra Anumzamoka ante vitenerantenka tazeri kasefa huo.
Zavi'manete'za avimzama nehankresaza vahe'mo'za ranke hu'za muse zagame nehu'za ne'zana hamaregahaze.
Avimzama hankre'naku'ma eri'za kantegama nevu'za, zavitemema nevanamo'za, hozafinti'ma ne'zama hamre'za nontegama eri'za ne-esuza ranke hu'za muse zagamera nehu'za eri'za egahaze.
